name: kiejo-studio
description: Jacob Bryant's (Kiejo Studio) space on the internet for his graphic design portfolio
author: Jacob Bryant

scripts.predeploy: yarn clean && yarn build && shx cp CNAME dist/
scripts.deploy: rm -rf node_modules/.cache/gh-pages && V=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "v$V" && git push origin main && gh-pages -d dist -f -m "v$V"
scripts.gitUpdate: V=$(node -p "require('./package.json').version") && git add . && git commit -m "v$V" && git push origin main
